I was on the chess team.
Oh my God.
- Just place a bet. - Welcome.
Doesn't matter if you lose.

One hundred, sir, in change. Okay. Everybody ready?

Place your bets.
He's headed towards you.
Stone, walk away.
- Walk away. Walk away-- -

You split your eights.
Splitting your eights. Eighteen.
Eighteen.
Dealer has 17.
- Ah, you win. - You win it.

- - Thank you.

Not bad for your first time out of the van. I think I just lost two years off my life.

Where the hell's Mulvaney?

Take it anywhere you like.

Shit.

Comms compromised.

Fifty meters away, over the handrail to your right.

On it.

Um… Stone, big drop coming up.
Big drop.

Really, really big.

More than you can imagine.
It wouldn't be enough.

Must be.

translation.fr: Quatre armes de poing, un fusil, et un sniper

Get away from them. Take the path to your right.

I got the lights.
Behind you!

- Yang. - Hey.

Shit.
Jesus. He's dead.

♪ Believe me, all I want is you ♪
Genuine dog's breakfast.

Yang gave the wrong person a heart attack.

The most highly trained agents
working together to keep peace in a turbulent world.

Right in the eye.

- Kidding. I take it back. - No.

A field agent should be ready for anything.

translation.en: A weak moment.
I liked it.
So… the girl.
What news?
No news. We were told not to look.

Look, if we leave it to the pen- pushers at MI6,

I should've gone beyond the mission and brought her in.

And besides, it wasn't our objective.
Why don't you try and live a little? Could be fun.

translation.en: - This is different. - Hm.
So, rules are rules unless they apply to you.
translation.fr: La loi, c'est la loi. Sauf si tu es concerné.

translation.en: Maybe I should listen to one of these dreary podcasts of yours.

Mock our music, and I won't tell you my theory.

She's new to the scene. Has to be. Otherwise, we would have heard about her.
translation.fr: Elle est nouvelle dans le milieu. Sinon, on en aurait entendu parler.

She's working with someone else. A veteran. But who?

translation.en: Can I come?
Bye, Parker.
Ivo? It's been a while.
Nine of Hearts, it's good to see you.

translation.en: - How's it going? - It's been busy. This way.

translation.fr: La Charte a géré trois menaces concrètes ce matin.

translation.en: Potential sarin gas attack in Paris.

translation.en: The Heart predicted the time and location of the attack with 87% certainty.
translation.fr: Le Cœur a prévu l'heure et le lieu de l'attentat avec 87 % de fiabilité.

translation.en: Eight of Hearts is on site now.

translation.en: Six is defusing a potential international incident
translation.fr: Six de Cœur désamorce un incident international potentiel

translation.en: in the South China Sea.
translation.fr: en mer de Chine du Sud.

translation.en: And Diamonds team's handling hackers targeting the North American power grid.
translation.fr: L'équipe de Carreau gère des hackers qui visent le réseau électrique américain.

translation.en: That, um… That's the peacock.
- Hi. - Came with the house.
- - Hey, Jack. Enjoying your new office?
translation.fr: Salut, Valet. Content de ton nouveau bureau ?

translation.en: We can't all be gallivanting around the Alps.
translation.fr: On ne batifole pas tous dans les Alpes.

translation.en: Have you seen her yet?
Well, let's see. You lost control of the situation, target is dead,
translation.fr: Vous avez perdu le contrôle de la situation, la cible est morte, vous avez tué six hommes.

translation.en: then you had to kill six men.
translation.fr: la cible est morte, vous avez tué six hommes.

translation.en: What a glorious outcome.

translation.en: - Victoria Crosses all around. - Morning, Nomad.
translation.fr: Quel palmarès ! Ça mérite une médaille. Bonjour, Nomade.

translation.en: Good to see you too. Love what you've done with the place.
translation.fr: Le plaisir est partagé. Bravo pour la déco.

translation.en: Is she developing a sense of humor?
- Did you find the girl? - Of course.

translation.en: She is from Pune in the west of India.
translation.fr: Elle vient de Pune, dans l'ouest de l'Inde.

translation.en: Orphaned at eight.
How'd she learn to program? Ever heard of Niam Kharche?

translation.en: Billionaire investor, pharmaceuticals.
Had business in Pune. Ran IT workshops for kids in underprivileged communities.
translation.fr: Il proposait des ateliers d'informatique à Pune pour les défavorisés.

translation.en: He spotted her in one of these programs.
translation.fr: Il l'a repérée dans un de ces programmes.

translation.en: Yeah. He saw she was a prodigy, took her under his wing, trained her up,
translation.fr: Il a vu son génie, l'a prise sous son aile et l'a formée.

translation.en: and then they had a falling out.
Why?
The Heart's better at whats than whys.
And the what is, she split from Kharche and disappeared.
translation.fr: Le résultat, c'est qu'elle a lâché Kharche et filé.

translation.en: She's 22 now.
Not much older than when we met.

translation.en: Yes, but she fell in with a bunch of criminal lowlifes.
translation.fr: Sauf qu'elle s'est retrouvée avec des voyous.

translation.en: Some people get all the luck.

translation.en: We think that Keya set up the casino of blood.

translation.en: She knew about Mulvaney's gambling habit and used it to lure him in.
translation.fr: Elle savait que Mulvaney jouait et elle l'a manipulé.

Mulvaney had become obsessed with a new weapon, a myth.

translation.en: A quantum computer sophisticated enough to hack into anything, anywhere.
translation.fr: Un processeur quantique capable de hacker n'importe quoi, n'importe où.

translation.en: The Heart.
So, where is she now?
The Heart predicts with 96% certainty

translation.en: that Keya is heading to Lisbon for the opening of Club Moritz.
translation.fr: que Keya fera l'ouverture du Club Moritz à Lisbonne.

translation.en: So, we will leak her location to MI6.
translation.fr: On communiquera sa position au MI6.

translation.en: Then we should have your operation back up and running within 24 hours.
translation.fr: Ensuite, votre opération sera lancée sous 24 heures.

translation.en: It doesn't feel right.
Keya chose to hack into our comms feed on the mountain.
translation.fr: Keya a décidé de hacker notre réseau à la montagne.

translation.en: She revealed herself to me, looked me straight in the eye.
translation.fr: Elle s'est démasquée, m'a regardée en face.

translation.en: I'm not sure if we should ignore the Heart,
translation.fr: Je me demande si on doit ignorer le Cœur,

translation.en: the closest mankind has to perfect intelligence,
because of eye contact in a bar.
translation.fr: pour un regard dans un bar.

translation.en: This might be why you're single, Jack.
Just follow the numbers.
Your mission is Lisbon.
And if she's not there?
translation.fr: Et si elle n'y est pas ?

translation.en: Eat tapas.
Just not with your MI6 team.
So, you're spying on me now.
I'm tracking my asset.
You know what you signed up for. No relationships. No friends.
translation.fr: Vous savez à quoi vous vous êtes engagée. Ni relations ni amis.

translation.en: No poolside tête- à- tête.
translation.fr: Ni tête-à-tête au bord de la piscine.

translation.en: What we do is too important.
translation.fr: Ce qu'on fait est trop important.

translation.en: When governments fail, the only thing left is the Charter.
translation.fr: Là où les gouvernements échouent, il ne reste que la Charte.

translation.en: I'm undercover. This is just part of it.
translation.fr: Je suis infiltrée, ça fait partie du boulot.

translation.en: - Everything's under control. - Good.
Keep it that way.
Your target is Dhawan.
Come on, Keya. Take the bait.
Smile.
Hey, Bailey.
Hey. We got a lead on hacker girl. We're going to Lisbon.
translation.fr: On a une piste pour la hackeuse. On va à Lisbonne.

translation.en: Better call the cat sitter.
Oh no, no. Barry's all right. He's--
I told him, no parties.
Okay. Sweet dreams.
Wheels up at eight.
Got it.
- Night, Bailey. - Night.
What about this?
Ah Jesus. Just when we thought it couldn't get worse.
translation.fr: Dire qu'on pensait que ça pouvait pas être pire !

translation.en: - Are you singing? - I'm clearing my throat.
translation.fr: - Tu chantes, Parker ? - Non, je m'éclaircis la voix.

translation.en: Tune.
- Look at that. - No.
Voice of an angel.
♪ I want to be with you everywhere ♪ ♪ Oh, I ♪
Bailey, you should meet my gran. She has the same taste in music,
translation.fr: Je te présenterai ma grand-mère. Elle écoute ça

translation.en: and you have the same hair.
It's my van, my tunes.
translation.fr: C'est mon van, c'est mon son.

translation.en: Yeah, that's what she says.
- Oh, sorry. - Whoa.
translation.fr: Pardon ! La prochaine fois, vas-y franco. Je me suis pas cassé de dent.

translation.en: Little harder next time. I didn't quite crack a tooth.
translation.fr: La prochaine fois, vas-y franco. Je me suis pas cassé de dent.

translation.en: You okay back there?
Yeah, I'm fine. I'm just, uh…
- Carsick. - Mm.
- It's Bailey's music. -
Come on, swap seats with me.
- What? No, no, no. It's fine. - Come on. No, it's fine. Move.
translation.fr: - Quoi ? Non, c'est bon. - Allez, bouge !

translation.en: - Jesus! - Seatbelt.
Bailey!
Aren't you supposed to be an elite driver?
translation.fr: T'es censé être un as du volant !

translation.en: Sorry.
- Okay? - Yeah.
How long till the club opens?
We head out in a couple of hours.
Hey, Stone.
Sent you something. Check it out.
- What is this? - It's for my niece's birthday.
What do you think? Female perspective?
It's very pink.
Parker, this music is ancient.
translation.fr: Parker, c'est de la musique de vieux !

translation.en: - What are you, a hundred years old? - It's called culture.
translation.fr: - T'as 100 ans ou quoi ? - On appelle ça la culture.

translation.en: Yeah. Sorry, Parker, I'm with Yang. Yang!
translation.fr: Désolé, Parker, je suis d'accord avec Yang.

translation.en: - Woo! - Oh, okay.
Now we're talking.
Oh, come on, Bailey. You know you want to.
translation.fr: Allez, Bailey. Tu en meurs d'envie.

translation.en: Yes, I do.
Stone?
- Oh yeah. - Stone, come on.
You know you want to. Come on.
Oh no you don't.
Watch out, you might actually enjoy yourself.
translation.fr: Fais gaffe, tu risques de t'amuser.

translation.en: - She's smiling. - Oh yeah!
Six hostiles entering the building…
translation.fr: Six ennemis entrent dans le bâtiment.

translation.en: Nine, I have you.
Six hostiles moving up the stairs. More outside.
translation.fr: Six ennemis dans l'escalier, d'autres dehors.

translation.en: They'll breach the doorway in four…
translation.fr: Ils vont enfoncer la porte dans quatre…

translation.en: three…
two…
one.
Parker.
We're gonna get you out.
Stone, go now!
Nine, the window.
Get out. Now.
Stone, you will die.
Jack, I need your help.
Plotting exit routes… now.
Come on. Parker, come on. Come on!
I'm going back in.
What? No.
Saving them is not your mission.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas à les sauver.

translation.en: - Get out of there. - Jack, please.
translation.fr: - Sors de là. - Je t'en prie.

translation.en: No. At best, you break cover. Most likely, you die.
translation.fr: Au mieux, tu es grillée. Au pire, tu meurs.

translation.en: Stone?
Stone!
- Holy shit. - Come on.
Time to go.
There'll be more. Come on.
Van's a no- go. Go, go.
translation.fr: On oublie le van. Allez, vite !

translation.en: Does that thing ever work?
Yeah, yeah. It works. Just not on every car.
translation.fr: Oui, mais pas sur n'importe quelle voiture.

translation.en: There. Move!
Stone. Now would be good.
Move over. I've got this.
- Away from the guns, Stone. Away! - Just a second.
Down! Down! Down!
Go! Go, go, go, go!
Okay, Stone. Time to start talking.
translation.fr: Stone, c'est le moment de parler.

translation.en: You hack, you fight, and you drive. Parker, are you getting this?
translation.fr: Tu hackes, tu cognes, tu conduis. Parker, ça te parle ?

translation.en: - Three vehicles. Lots of guns. - Yeah, I can tell by the bullets.
translation.fr: - Trois véhicules, un max d'armes. - Oui, je vois ça.

translation.en: - Stone! - Sort of in the middle of something.
Brakes, brakes, brakes!
Oh, okay. Okay, you got it.
Yang.
- Got it. - On your three o'clock.
In three, two, one.
Clip's out.
- Are you trying to kill us? - Pretty much the opposite, actually.
translation.fr: - Tu veux nous tuer ? - C'est plutôt le contraire.

translation.en: Okay. This might be kind of intense.
translation.fr: Bon, ça risque de secouer grave.

translation.en: Oh, this isn't good.
- Stone, they're still coming. - I know.
translation.fr: - On les a pas semés. - Je sais.

translation.en: Hold on.
Well, I can't speak for the others, but I… I think you're ready for the field.
translation.fr: Ça n'engage que moi, mais je te trouve prête pour le terrain.

translation.en: We need to get off the road and lose this van.
translation.fr: Faut quitter la route et laisser le van.

translation.en: Rachel.
Stone.
Who the hell are you?
It's complicated.
- - From where I'm sitting,
a baby agent from IT just took out an entire kill team.
translation.fr: c'est qu'une novice a buté une bande de tueurs.

translation.en: - Bailey, what's taking you so long? - Shit.
translation.fr: - Bailey, t'es long à la détente. - Merde !

translation.en: The Charter? You're the… you're the bloody Charter?
translation.fr: La Charte ? Tu bosses pour la Charte ?

translation.en: What, are you trying to bring in Dhawan yourself?
translation.fr: Tu cherches à choper Dhawan en solo ?

translation.en: Are you working with her?
Answer him.
You owe us that.
We're after her too.
Oh my God.
The Charter's real.
And you're one of them.
I wish I could've told you more.
But we all want the same thing.
translation.fr: Mais on a tous le même but.

translation.en: No, we don't.
You're not the only one with a secret.
translation.fr: T'es pas la seule à avoir un secret.

translation.en: Did they mean something to you?
Oh, come on, Rachel. You're only playing a part, right?
translation.fr: Allez, Rachel. Tout ça, c'est un jeu, pas vrai ?

translation.en: Who are you, Parker? Why don't you ask the Heart?
translation.fr: - Qui tu es, Parker ? - Demande au Cœur.

translation.en: If you wanted me dead, you would have shot me first.
translation.fr: Si tu voulais ma peau, tu m'aurais déjà tuée.

translation.en: Still a few things I need to know.
translation.fr: Il me faut encore quelques infos.

translation.en: About you, the Charter.
But perhaps most of all,
I was looking forward to a fight.
- - Talk.
Keya and I learned that the Charter infiltrated MI6.
translation.fr: Avec Keya, on a su que la Charte avait infiltré le MI6.

translation.en: I had to flush out who.
At first, I thought it was Yang,
but I was so pleased it was you.
translation.fr: mais je préfère que ça soit toi.

translation.en: Keya's working for you?
Your hand's shaking.
You barely nicked me.
That was the point.
Poison- tipped.
A little basic, I know, but it hits the spot.
translation.fr: Basique, je sais, mais ça fonctionne.

translation.en: Looks like the paralysis is kicking in.
I spent six years looking for you people, Stone.
translation.fr: J'ai passé six ans à vous traquer, toi et les tiens.

translation.en: Then fate brings you straight to me.
translation.fr: Et voilà que le destin te mène à moi.

translation.en: You're a very good agent.
translation.fr: Tu es un très bon agent.

translation.en: But you were so busy letting a machine think for you that you missed me.
translation.fr: Mais à force de laisser une machine penser pour toi, tu m'as raté.

translation.en: Right here,
in front of your face…
the whole time.
And Mulvaney?
Well, he was tech- averse like me.
Kept everything up here.
So, Keya and I set up our casino of blood to lure him in.
translation.fr: Alors, Keya et moi, on a monté le coup du casino pour l'appâter.

translation.en: We needed to have a little chat about the Heart.
translation.fr: Il fallait qu'on discute du Cœur.

translation.en: Talk.
The Heart is what gives the Charter its power.
translation.fr: Le Cœur est ce qui donne son pouvoir à la Charte.

translation.en: It's the most formidable weapon you never knew existed.
translation.fr: C'est l'arme la plus incroyable de tous les temps.

translation.en: It can hack into anything, anywhere.
Cell phones, power grids, the banks, governments, military, health records.
translation.fr: Portables, réseaux électriques, banques, gouvernements, armée, dossiers médicaux.

translation.en: Your secrets.
It knows you better than you know yourself.
translation.fr: Il nous connaît mieux qu'on ne se connaît.

translation.en: It's determinism.
With access to trillions of data points at once, its modeling is so accurate
translation.fr: Avec un accès à des billions de données, son modèle est si élaboré

translation.en: it can predict the future.
The Heart is knowledge and power.
translation.fr: Le Cœur, c'est le savoir et le pouvoir.

translation.en: It can crash a market or drop a plane out of the sky.
translation.fr: Il peut provoquer un krach boursier ou un crash d'avion.

translation.en: Who needs to steal a nuclear bomb when you can control them all?
translation.fr: Pourquoi voler une arme nucléaire quand on peut toutes les contrôler ?

translation.en: If you own the Heart…
you own the world.
Where is it?
Where… is it?
Only a Charter member could tell you.
translation.fr: Seul un membre de la Charte peut répondre.

translation.en: The poison's a cholinesterase inhibitor.
Cold War paralytic.
translation.fr: Le paralysant de la guerre froide.

translation.en: My chemist does all the classics.
Like cyanide.
Oh, relax, Rachel.
Killing you is not part of the plan. We need you to deliver a package first.
translation.fr: Te tuer n'est pas au programme. D'abord, tu as une livraison à faire.

translation.en: - - I've loved working with you, Rachel.
Hand on heart.
Stone?
She's awake. She's awake.
Hold her here. Hold her down.
Oh shit.
- - Take this. Help me. Help me here.
Keep her steady.
Cholinest-- Cholines--
Wait. Get me atropine. Five mils.
It's cholinesterase.
Jack. Jack.
- We've been breached. - How?
It's… There's a Trojan in our system delivered wirelessly.
translation.fr: Il y a un cheval de Troie dans notre système

translation.en: Chewing through security like it isn't there.
Restrict all access.
Nomad, I've tried. No- go. They're trying to access the Heart.
translation.fr: J'ai essayé, rien à faire. Ils veulent accéder au Cœur.

translation.en: From where? We're walled off.
It's a weak wireless signal. It's coming from…
translation.fr: C'est un signal wifi faible, qui vient de…

translation.en: inside the building.
Quickly. We need to monitor her airway.
translation.fr: Vite, il faut la mettre sous monitoring.

translation.en: - Go ahead. - Hold her.
Press down.
That didn't do it.
What's happened? I need to know what's happened.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui s'est passé ? Il faut que je sache.

translation.en: How long were we compromised?
Three minutes and 45 seconds. Running a system check now.
translation.fr: 3 minutes et 45 secondes. J'analyse le système.

translation.en: We need to know what they accessed. Is the Locker safe?
translation.fr: Voyons à quoi ils ont eu accès. Le Coffre ?

translation.en: The Locker is still flying high
translation.fr: Le Coffre est en plein ciel,

translation.en: with the Heart safe inside, 85,000 feet up.
translation.fr: avec le Cœur à l'intérieur, à 25 000 m d'altitude.

translation.en: No one's getting up there without a space shuttle.
It's passing over the Atlantic, towards West Africa.
translation.fr: Il survole l'Atlantique vers l'Afrique de l'Ouest.

translation.en: And the other suits, can they still access the Heart?
translation.fr: Les autres équipes ont toujours accès au Cœur ?

translation.en: - Looks like it-- Jesus. - What?
There've been 100,000 attempts to access files.
Clubs team are analyzing the data, but looks like our security held.
translation.fr: L'équipe de Trèfle analyse les données. La sécurité a tenu bon.

translation.en: We need to shut it all down now.
- Shut what down? The Heart? - Until we know what they've done.
translation.fr: - Arrêter le Cœur ? - Le temps d'en savoir plus.

translation.en: We have no idea what they're capable of.
translation.fr: On ignore de quoi ils sont capables.

translation.en: Don't need to shut it down to find out what they've done.
- We'd be harming ourselves. - We don't know. She's not stupid.
translation.fr: - On se mettrait en danger. - Elle est pas idiote.

translation.en: - And neither are we. - Sure about that? Because right now--
translation.fr: - Nous non plus. - Tu es sûr ? Parce que là…

translation.en: Rachel. Rachel. He's right. We'll sort it.
translation.fr: Rachel, il a raison. On va se débrouiller.

translation.en: We?
A word in private. Now.
translation.fr: On doit parler en privé. Maintenant.

translation.en: I told you. I knew Keya was playing us, playing the Heart.
translation.fr: Je vous l'avais dit, je savais que Keya visait le Cœur.

translation.en: No, you didn't. No, you didn't You had a feeling.
Nothing… nothing concrete, nothing actionable.
translation.fr: Rien de concret, rien de tangible.

translation.en: A mood, a notion, a hunch, a bollocks. We don't trade in those.
translation.fr: Une intuition, une idée, une connerie ! Ça vaut rien.

translation.en: I knew she wouldn't be there.
You ignored the Heart, and you went back in.
translation.fr: Vous avez ignoré le Cœur pour y retourner.

translation.en: - To save my team. - They weren't your team.
They died anyway. You going back made sure of that.
translation.fr: Ils sont morts, à cause de vous.

translation.en: You blew your cover.
If you'd left when we told you to, Parker would've followed you,
translation.fr: Si vous aviez obéi, Parker vous aurait suivie,

translation.en: we'd have caught him, and Yang and Bailey might be alive.
translation.fr: on l'aurait eu, Yang et Bailey seraient en vie.

translation.en: - I should've just listened to the Heart? - Yes.
translation.fr: J'aurais dû écouter le Cœur ? Oui.

translation.en: The Charter exists for one reason.
translation.fr: La Charte existe pour une bonne raison.

translation.en: To maximize lives saved. That's the only moral metric there is.
translation.fr: Sauver un maximum de vies. La seule unité de mesure morale.

translation.en: And it's a calculation. A pure and objective calculation.
translation.fr: C'est un calcul. Un calcul purement objectif.

translation.en: Made for us by a machine.
Have you forgotten how radical that is?
It doesn't mean that what we do is easy or feels nice.
translation.fr: Ça ne signifie pas que notre rôle est simple ou plaisant.

translation.en: You'll have the voices of those people in your head for the rest of your life.
translation.fr: Vous entendrez leurs voix toute votre vie.

translation.en: And you will never not feel responsible for them ever.
translation.fr: Et vous ne cesserez jamais de culpabiliser.

translation.en: But the end justifies the means.
translation.fr: Mais la fin justifie les moyens.

translation.en: I spent every day with Parker for a year and didn't see it coming.
translation.fr: J'ai passé un an avec Parker, et j'ai rien vu.

translation.en: Neither did the Heart.
So, what do we do now?
Gonna make some tough choices, and this is the first one.
translation.fr: Je vais faire des choix cruels. Dont celui-ci.

translation.en: I'm standing you down, Rachel.
Go home. Get some rest.
Keep your head down. Don't do anything stupid.
translation.fr: Faites profil bas, pas de bêtises.

translation.en: You can't do this.
You're compromised.
Parker knows you. Dhawan knows you.
And the other Kings, quite rightly… don't know if you can be trusted.
translation.fr: Et les autres rois, à juste titre, se méfient de vous.

translation.en: And you?
I want to protect what we've spent 20 years trying to build.
translation.fr: Je veux protéger ce qu'on a mis 20 ans à bâtir.

translation.en: So, I'm just out.
It's about the greater good.
It's nothing personal.
No.
I'm starting to see that.
Hello?
- Stone? Wrong number. Wait. - It's for me.
translation.fr: - Stone ? Il y a erreur. - C'est moi.

translation.en: That's my phone. I--
So, why is a Charter agent riding around all alone,
translation.fr: Pourquoi un agent de la Charte se balade seul,

translation.en: just hours after being poisoned?
Doesn't feel like they're taking care of their most valuable player.
translation.fr: Ils s'occupent mal de leur atout le plus précieux.

translation.en: What do you want?
Don't be a sore loser.
I bet you used to think we were so alike. Now you know I'm better.
translation.fr: Tu pensais qu'on était pareilles. Sauf que je suis meilleure.

translation.en: Better? You killed my friends.
translation.fr: Meilleure ? Tu as tué mes amis.

translation.en: What?
You didn't know, huh?
Well, I told you this wasn't a game, Keya.
translation.fr: Je t'ai dit que c'était pas un jeu.

translation.en: Heart or no Heart,
I'm coming for you.
- Morning, ma'am. - Morning.
Nomad. Great spot.
All four kings in the same room. How long has it been, three years?
translation.fr: Les quatre rois réunis. On a pas vu ça depuis quand ? Trois ans ?

translation.en: Not long enough.
So, who is this Parker, and how did we miss him?
translation.fr: Qui est ce Parker et comment il a pu nous échapper ?

translation.en: Career intelligence agent. Born in Belfast, lives alone.
translation.fr: Agent du renseignement. Né à Belfast, vit seul.

translation.en: He has no one he cares for. There's nothing much to live for.
translation.fr: Il n'a personne à charge, pas de raison de vivre.

translation.en: He has devoted his life to a country that sees him as expendable.
translation.fr: Il a consacré sa vie à un pays qui le considère comme un pion.

translation.en: Okay. We get it. All that is fuel for the fire.
translation.fr: On a compris. Il y a de quoi alimenter le feu,

translation.en: - But it won't burn without a spark. - I was getting to that.
translation.fr: mais il faut une étincelle pour l'allumer. J'allais y venir.

translation.en: I had to lean extremely hard on some very old friends for this.
translation.fr: J'ai dû faire pression sur de très vieux amis pour ça.

translation.en: Chechnya, December 2015.
What's this?
It was before your time. Before the Heart, for that matter.
translation.fr: C'était avant votre arrivée. Avant le Cœur, d'ailleurs.

translation.en: A Chechen warlord was given free rein by the Chechen and Russian governments.
translation.fr: La Tchétchénie et la Russie ont donné carte blanche à un général tchétchène.

translation.en: The West, as always, were looking the other way.
translation.fr: L'Occident, comme toujours, a fermé les yeux.

translation.en: He was wiping out whole villages, trying to stamp out dissent.
translation.fr: Il a rasé des villages pour éradiquer la dissidence.

translation.en: But… what's this got to do with Parker?
He was there.
Different identity. No electronic records.
translation.fr: Sous une autre identité, aucune trace numérique.

translation.en: But he was there, with MI6,
translation.fr: Mais il était là, avec le MI6,

translation.en: delivering weapons to take the warlord out.
translation.fr: pour livrer des armes afin d'éliminer le général.

translation.en: Any sign of them?
You got an ETA yet?
They'll be here.
We intercepted a communication.
It was a trap.
Intelligence came through from MI6 that their entire team had been executed.
translation.fr: On a appris par le MI6 que toute leur équipe avait été exécutée.

translation.en: We thought there was no one left to save.
translation.fr: On a cru qu'il ne restait personne à sauver.

translation.en: The region was a tinderbox on the verge of full civil war.
translation.fr: La région était une poudrière au bord de la guerre civile.

translation.en: We couldn't let those weapons fall into the warlord's hands.
translation.fr: On ne pouvait pas laisser ces armes aux mains du général.

translation.en: It would have cost thousands of lives.
translation.fr: Il y aurait eu des milliers de morts.

translation.en: We had a drone that was stationed overhead armed with missiles.
translation.fr: On avait un drone armé de missiles stationné au-dessus.

translation.en: I gave the order myself.
We made it look like a rebel force had ordered the drone strike.
translation.fr: On a fait comme si des forces rebelles avaient ordonné l'attaque.

translation.en: MI6 buried their mistake.
translation.fr: Le MI6 a camouflé son erreur.

translation.en: No report, no investigation.
No record of the personnel who had been involved.
translation.fr: Pas de trace des agents impliqués.

translation.en: We thought everyone had died.
translation.fr: Pour nous, ils étaient tous morts.

translation.en: Until a few hours ago.
What a mess.
So, you think… he knows it was us?
translation.fr: Alors, d'après vous, il sait que c'était nous ?

translation.en: I think that's a safe assumption.
And now he wants to destroy the Charter.
translation.fr: Et maintenant, il veut détruire la Charte.

translation.en: You killed Bailey and Yang?
translation.fr: Tu as tué Bailey et Yang ?

translation.en: That wasn't the plan.
You stick to the tech and leave strategy to me, okay?
translation.fr: Tu gères la technologie, et moi, la stratégie, d'accord ?

translation.en: Let me remind you, we're partners. Okay? So if you want me to do my job,
translation.fr: Pour info, on fait équipe. Si tu veux que je fasse mon boulot,

translation.en: you have to tell me what you're doing before you do it.
translation.fr: dis-moi ce que tu fais avant de le faire.

translation.en: Let me remind you, the Charter don't give two shits
translation.fr: Pour info, la Charte se fout des gens comme Bailey ou Yang.

translation.en: about people like Bailey and Yang.
translation.fr: la Charte se fout des gens comme Bailey ou Yang.

translation.en: So, if you want us to succeed, you shouldn't either.
translation.fr: Si tu veux qu'on réussisse, tu dois t'en foutre aussi.

translation.en: Hey, Barry.
I'm a friend of your dad's.
translation.fr: Je suis une amie de ton papa.

translation.en: It's okay.
I've got you.
The camera.
She hacked into the camera feed.
translation.fr: Elle a hacké le flux de la caméra.

translation.en: Let's see how well she covered her tracks.
translation.fr: Voyons si elle a bien effacé ses traces.

translation.en: There she is.
What's in the desert, Keya?
I'm guessing it's not the nightlife.
translation.fr: Pas pour la vie nocturne, j'imagine.

translation.en: Are you shitting me?
West Africa. The Locker.
You ever done this before? Choppered in at over 40,000 feet?
translation.fr: Tu as déjà fait ça ? Piloter un hélico à plus de 12 000 m ?

translation.en: Trick question. No one has.
translation.fr: Question piège. Ça a jamais été fait.

translation.en: But my mama always said I could do anything.
translation.fr: Mais ma mère disait que je pouvais tout faire.

translation.en: How long do we have before the Locker descends?
translation.fr: La descente du Coffre est pour quand ?

translation.en: Eleven hours and seven minutes.
At which point, the Charter will realize what's going on.
translation.fr: À ce stade, la Charte saura ce qui se passe.

translation.en: It'll take nine minutes and 26 seconds for the Locker to drop to 40,000 feet.
translation.fr: Il faudra 9 minutes et 26 secondes pour que le Coffre descende à 12 000 m.

translation.en: We'll have about eight minutes to get in, take the Heart,
translation.fr: On aura 8 minutes pour entrer, prendre le Cœur

translation.en: and get out again before they regain control.
Very precise.
You're sure?
No. I'll be sure when it descends.
translation.fr: Je serai sûre quand il descendra.

translation.en: If they found my code, it won't descend, they'll be waiting for us, and we all die.
translation.fr: S'ils crackent mon code, il descendra pas et on mourra.

translation.en: - Hey. - Good morning.
What time is it?
Uh, it's nearly seven.
What? Oh shit.
Any luck?
Uh… nothing. But they need to pop their heads up at some point.
translation.fr: Rien. Mais ils vont forcément se pointer.

translation.en: - I'll see if they-- -
Get Nomad now! Get Nomad now!
Just get me up there. I'll do the rest.
translation.fr: Emmène-moi là-haut, je m'occupe du reste.

translation.en: Nomad will string me up for this.
translation.fr: Nomade va me le faire payer cher.

translation.en: Tell her I stole your keys.
translation.fr: Dis que j'ai volé tes clés.

translation.en: You'll just have to trust me.
Okay. Moment of truth.
translation.fr: Bon, c'est la minute de vérité.

translation.en: How will we know if it's worked?
translation.fr: Comment savoir si ça a marché ?

translation.en: Would you look at that?
The Locker has been dropped 15,000 feet in the last two minutes.
translation.fr: Le Coffre est descendu de 4 500 m en 2 minutes.

translation.en: Still descending.
Security systems are all down. I'm locked out.
translation.fr: La sécurité est coupée. Je n'ai plus d'accès.

translation.en: - How is that even possible? Another hack? - No. No.
translation.fr: Comment ça se fait ? On a encore été hackés ? Non, c'était le but de leur première attaque.

translation.en: This is why they did it the first time.
translation.fr: Non, c'était le but de leur première attaque.

translation.en: It's been lying dormant in our system until now.
translation.fr: Le virus était en sommeil dans le système.

translation.en: - Can you override it? - I'm trying.
The air lock's been breached.
Contact every Charter agent in the region.
translation.fr: Alertez tous les agents du secteur.

translation.en: There's no one within 500 miles.
Approaching coordinates in five, four, three--
translation.fr: Destination atteinte dans cinq, quatre, trois…

translation.en: - I hope you know what you're doing. - Tell me about it.
translation.fr: - T'as pas droit à l'erreur. - M'en parle pas.

translation.en: - We have a something approaching fast. - A something?
translation.fr: Il y a un truc en approche. Un truc ?

translation.en: - Thirty seconds out. - What is it?
I think-- I think it's a someone.
Who is it?
Go in closer.
Is that-- ?
It's Stone.
I have to descend. Lower the rotor speed.
translation.fr: Il faut que je descende. Ralentis.

translation.en: Copy that. See you in seven minutes.
She's not gonna make it.
Look who it is.
- I'm gonna need a minute. - No!
The ship's lining is filled with hydrogen. One spark, and we're all dead.
translation.fr: C'est plein d'hydrogène. Une étincelle et on est morts.

translation.en: No way to get hold of her.
Come on, Rachel.
Come on.
It's over, Keya.
For who?
I told you not to get out of the van.
translation.fr: Je t'avais dit de pas sortir du van.

translation.en: You also told me to have some fun.
translation.fr: Tu m'as aussi dit de m'amuser.

translation.en: It's gone.
And now you answer to me.
We've lost the Heart.
Not yet.
Parker. Ninety seconds. Let's go.
Shame about your parachute. You'll be needing that.
translation.fr: Dommage pour ton parachute, tu en aurais eu besoin.

translation.en: - - Get off me!
- Get after them. - Impossible.
- We'll be lucky to get to base as it is. -
translation.fr: Impossible, ça sera déjà bien d'arriver à la base.

translation.en: Get away!
Leave me alone!
Morning, sunshine.
Give me that thing before somebody gets--
I don't think so.
So, here's what's gonna happen.
You're gonna secret- agent our way back to civilization,
translation.fr: Tu rejoins la civilisation en mode agent secret

translation.en: and I'm gonna follow three steps behind you with this gun.
translation.fr: et je reste à trois pas derrière avec ce flingue.

translation.en: - Where's the Heart? - Parker has it.
translation.fr: - Et le Cœur ? - C'est Parker qui l'a.

translation.en: But I encrypted it to my biometrics, so it's useless without me.
translation.fr: Mais il fonctionne pas sans mes données biométriques.

translation.en: Come on, get up.
If I shoot you now, all this is over.
translation.fr: Si je te tue, tout est terminé.

translation.en: Show you the same mercy you showed Bailey and Yang.
translation.fr: Je peux te faire ce que vous avez fait à Bailey et Yang.

translation.en: It's the logical play, Rachel.
It's what the Heart would tell you to do.
translation.fr: C'est ce que le Cœur te dirait.

translation.en: I'm not like you.
On your feet.
We need to keep moving.
So, what's the plan, Keya?
Trying to get even with Niam Kharche for kicking you out of the penthouse?
translation.fr: Te venger de Niam Kharche parce qu'il t'a virée de son loft ?

translation.en: Right. You think you know everything.
translation.fr: C'est ça, tu crois tout savoir.

translation.en: I bet the Heart told you that he adopted me,
translation.fr: Le Cœur a dû dire qu'il m'avait adoptée,

translation.en: lifted me out of nothing. But did it tell you why?
translation.fr: sauvée de la misère. Mais il a dit pourquoi ?

translation.en: Kharche used my parents like lab rats in a medical trial, and it killed them.
translation.fr: Kharche a utilisé mes parents comme cobayes de labo, ça les a tués.

translation.en: He covered everything up and took me in thinking he was doing me a favor,
translation.fr: Il m'a recueillie comme s'il me rendait service.

translation.en: but I let him think that because I knew one day,
translation.fr: J'ai joué le jeu, sachant qu'un jour,

translation.en: I'd be strong enough to make him pay for what he did to my parents.
translation.fr: j'aurais la force de le faire payer pour mes parents.

translation.en: So, you get to tear the whole world down?
Oh, this is not just for me. It's for people like me.
translation.fr: C'est pas que pour moi, mais pour mes semblables.

translation.en: Parker's gonna destroy the Charter.
I've got my whole naughty list, and we're going to expose them all.
translation.fr: J'ai ma liste de salauds, on va les dénoncer.

translation.en: With no thought of what comes next.
You're a child.
And you think the Charter's any better?
translation.fr: Pour toi, la Charte vaut mieux ?

translation.en: Just because they saved you doesn't make them good.
translation.fr: Ils t'ont sauvée, mais c'est pas des anges.

translation.en: You think I didn't look into you?
How many schools did you get kicked out of?
Seven? Eight?
Always a rebel. Always a problem.
Violent, alone, helpless.
- Stop. - Until the Charter comes along, right?
And gives you that discipline that you so clearly crave.
translation.fr: te donne la discipline dont tu as besoin.

translation.en: But did they take you in because you were good?
translation.fr: Ils t'ont prise parce que t'étais douée ?

translation.en: - Or because you were broken? - Enough.
translation.fr: - Ou parce que t'étais brisée ? - Assez.

translation.en: Maybe I was broken.
But there's a woman I know only as Nomad.
translation.fr: Mais il y a une femme du nom de Nomade.

translation.en: She rescued me, trained me,
showed me what's possible when there's someone watching your back.
translation.fr: montré ce qu'on pouvait faire quand on était protégé.

translation.en: Where is she now?
Let's go.
Parker's coming for you, and I wanna have a bigger gun when he shows up.
translation.fr: Parker va venir te chercher, je veux être mieux armée à son arrivée.

translation.en: They're headed for us.
Maybe it's Parker.
It's definitely not the Charter.
Mercenaries?
Okay, let's just, um, give them a good cover story.
translation.fr: Trouvons une bonne histoire à leur raconter.

translation.en: They'll keep us alive for ransom. We reel them in, and then bam.
translation.fr: Ils nous épargnent pour la rançon, on les piège et boum !

translation.en: Just to be clear, the bam is for you to take them out.
translation.fr: Boum, ça veut dire que tu les élimines.

translation.en: Yeah, I get that.
You know, the Charter can take down Kharche.
Parker's way isn't the only way.
translation.fr: La solution de Parker n'est pas la seule.

translation.en: Come with me.
She got away.
That wasn't the deal.
Killing her wasn't the deal either. You have to pay me now.
translation.fr: La tuer non plus. Payez-moi maintenant.

translation.en: The deal changed.
You're a hard woman to find.
Six of Hearts.
Nomad sends her best.
Dhawan is back with Parker. I slipped her a tracker.
translation.fr: Dhawan a rejoint Parker, je lui ai posé un traceur.

translation.en: They're heading north. Looping you in now.
translation.fr: Ils vont vers le nord. J'établis la liaison.

translation.en: Hi, Rachel.
Nice to hear your voice. I was a bit worried about you.
translation.fr: Ravie de vous entendre, j'étais inquiète.

translation.en: Were you?
Okay, got her. They're heading towards Iceland.
translation.fr: Je la vois. Ils sont en route pour l'Islande.

translation.en: I take it I'm no longer compromised.
translation.fr: J'imagine que je ne suis plus grillée.

translation.en: Well, they have the Heart, so we're all compromised.
translation.fr: Ils ont le Cœur, on est tous grillés.

translation.en: Parker's coming after the Charter, so we're heading to a secure location.
translation.fr: Parker veut récupérer le Cœur, on va en lieu sûr.

translation.en: Clubs is assembling a team.
We'll make sure they're on the ground by the time you arrive.
translation.fr: On fera en sorte qu'ils soient là à votre arrivée.

translation.en: And if we're too late?
Just get there as fast as you can.
If they get the Heart online, God knows what they're capable of.
translation.fr: S'ils mettent le Cœur en ligne, qui sait ce qu'ils feront ?

translation.en: I'm on my way.
It's not impregnable, but it's the best we've got.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas imprenable, mais on n'a pas mieux.

translation.en: If the Heart wants to find us, it will.
translation.fr: Si le Cœur veut nous trouver, il le fera.

translation.en: Will this hunk of junk make it to Iceland?
translation.fr: Ce tas de ferraille atteindra l'Islande ?

translation.en: Hell yeah.
Nice trick you pulled with the facial recognition yesterday.
translation.fr: Bien joué pour la reconnaissance faciale.

translation.en: Trying to put a lock on our new toy.
Would you come back for me if I hadn't?
translation.fr: Sans ça, tu serais revenu me chercher ?

translation.en: We're a team, Keya.
Don't do it again.
I think I have it.
I know where they're going. Reykjavik University computer lab.
translation.fr: Ils vont au labo informatique de l'université de Reykjavik.

translation.en: It has a cryo- storage facility, several floors of servers.
translation.fr: Il y a une unité de cryo-stockage, plein de serveurs.

translation.en: The tracker's heading straight for it.
See, Keya, don't say I don't keep my promises.
translation.fr: Tu vois, Keya, je tiens mes promesses.

translation.en: Okay, be ready. You know your instructions.
translation.fr: Allez, préparez-vous, vous savez ce que vous avez à faire.

translation.en: Couple of minutes, we'll be up and running.
Are we up?
We're up.
Is this your naughty list?
Emails, texts, bank accounts. The Heart's using my algorithm to sort through it all.
translation.fr: Mails, textos, comptes bancaires. Le Cœur utilise mon algorithme.

translation.en: So, we can find anyone? Gain access to anything?
translation.fr: On peut trouver n'importe qui ? Accéder à tout ?

translation.en: Greatest skeleton key in the world.
Show me.
There it is.
Evidence of Kharche's years of experiments on innocents across the country.
translation.fr: La preuve que Kharche a utilisé des cobayes innocents.

translation.en: That's the truth… for the world to see.
translation.fr: C'est la vérité, le monde entier doit savoir.

translation.en: That's impressive. But let's see what else this thing can do.
translation.fr: Impressionnant. Voyons ce que ça peut faire d'autre.

translation.en: Find me the Kings.
What are you doing?
Nancy Morrison. King of Diamonds. Ex- CIA.
translation.fr: Nancy Morrison, roi de Carreau, ex-agent de la CIA.

translation.en: The Heart tells us she's heading to a safe house with her family.
translation.fr: Selon le Cœur, elle va se mettre à l'abri en famille.

translation.en: Drop the lift.
Are you serious?
No. Do--
You're welcome.
Hang on. I have another one.
I think you're gonna like this, boss.
An unidentified military plane landed at a private airfield 33 minutes ago.
translation.fr: Un avion militaire non identifié a atterri il y a 33 minutes.

translation.en: There.
Jiang Hsu. Served 35 years in Chinese State Security Service.
translation.fr: Jiang Hsu. 35 ans dans les services de sécurité du gouvernement chinois.

translation.en: The King of Clubs is here in Iceland.
translation.fr: Le roi de Trèfle est en Islande.

translation.en: Even better. Where is he now?
translation.fr: Encore mieux. Où il est en ce moment ?

translation.en: Two minutes out.
Sending the plans now. Stone is on her way.
translation.fr: J'envoie les plans, Stone est en route.

translation.en: We don't have time to wait. Tell her to follow us in.
translation.fr: Pas le temps d'attendre, dis-lui de nous rejoindre.

translation.en: Any news of Spades or Hearts?
translation.fr: Des nouvelles des Pique ou des Cœur ?

translation.en: Nothing yet.
translation.fr: Des nouvelles des Pique ou des Cœur ? Pas encore.

translation.en: There were other people in that elevator. In that lobby.
translation.fr: Il y avait d'autres personnes dans l'ascenseur, dans le hall.

translation.en: Calm down, Keya.
You said we were going to expose Kharche and then the Charter, not murder them.
translation.fr: On devait dénoncer Kharche et la Charte, pas les tuer.

translation.en: The King of Hearts with her team. They're in a bunker outside of London.
translation.fr: Le roi de Cœur et son équipe sont dans un bunker près de Londres.

translation.en: Good.
Take them out.
We're approaching now.
- We'll see you on the other side. - You're going in with them?
translation.fr: - À plus tard. - Vous y allez aussi ?

translation.en: I ordered the strike on Parker. It's only fair.
translation.fr: J'ai ordonné la frappe sur Parker, c'est normal.

translation.en: You know… I would have made the same call in Chechnya.
translation.fr: Vous savez, j'aurais fait le même choix en Tchétchénie.

translation.en: Thanks. The right--
I've lost contact.
The Heart's online.
We're locked in.
Oh God. They've shut off our ventilation system.
translation.fr: Bon sang ! Ils ont coupé le système de ventilation.

translation.en: Jack, how long we got?
translation.fr: Valet, on a combien de temps ?

translation.en: At this rate, about an hour and we're out of oxygen.
translation.fr: À ce rythme-là, dans une heure, on sera à court d'oxygène.

translation.en: The Charter never worries about who gets in their way. Neither will we.
translation.fr: La Charte ne fait pas de quartier, nous non plus.

translation.en: King of Hearts is locked in. They'll be dead in an hour.
translation.fr: Le roi de Cœur est coincé. Ils vont mourir.

translation.en: - You have to stop this, please. - Someone has to control this power, Keya.
translation.fr: - Arrête ça, je t'en prie. - Quelqu'un doit avoir le contrôle.

translation.en: - Why not us? - This is not what we agreed.
You're still not seeing the bigger picture.
This isn't about some pissy little grievance you had with the bad man who killed your mom and dad.
translation.fr: Il s'agit pas de te venger de celui qui a tué tes parents.

translation.en: This is about power.
Concentrated in the hands of the few, of the very few who could use it for good,
translation.fr: Il est aux mains d'une poignée d'individus qui pourraient faire le bien

translation.en: who could actually make a change, but they don't.
translation.fr: et changer les choses, mais ne le font pas.

translation.en: At this moment, we are mining trillions of pieces of data.
translation.fr: Là, on est en train de miner des billions de données.

translation.en: In a matter of hours, I will be able to take down
translation.fr: Dans quelques heures, je pourrai supprimer les derniers membres de la Charte.

translation.en: the remaining members of the Charter.
translation.fr: je pourrai supprimer les derniers membres de la Charte.

translation.en: We've been used and manipulated our whole lives.
translation.fr: Toute notre vie, on a été manipulés.

translation.en: Now it's time for us to take control.
translation.fr: À nous de prendre le contrôle.

translation.en: Clubs team are inside the university building.
translation.fr: L'équipe de Trèfle est dans l'université.

translation.en: What… are you doing?
You wanna know how great men get power, Keya?
translation.fr: Tu sais d'où vient le pouvoir des meneurs ?

translation.en: It's not because they earn it…
or because they deserve it.
It is because when the moment comes,
they take it.
Stone is one minute out.
In position. We're all set.
She's approaching the university.
Stone, you need to get out now.
translation.fr: Stone, il faut que tu sortes vite.

translation.en: I don't have long.
Keya?
I have a failsafe uploading. It will disable the Heart.
translation.fr: J'installe un code qui désactivera le Cœur.

translation.en: They won't be able to access it without me.
translation.fr: Ils y accèderont pas sans moi.

translation.en: I'm outside. But you already know that.
translation.fr: Je suis dehors, mais tu le sais déjà.

translation.en: No, you're not. It's a trap.
translation.fr: Non, pas du tout, c'est un piège.

translation.en: I found your tracker.
The lab is a decoy. You need to get your team out now.
translation.fr: Le labo est un leurre, évacue vite ton équipe.

translation.en: - Why should I believe you? - Because you were right.
translation.fr: - Pourquoi je te croirais ? - Tu avais raison.

translation.en: Okay? You told me about Parker, and you were right about everything.
translation.fr: Tu savais pour Parker, tu avais raison sur tout.

translation.en: My parents would have never wanted this.
translation.fr: Mes parents n'auraient pas voulu ça.

translation.en: Just please listen to me.
Get your team out of there right now.
- Tell me where you are. - Okay.
I'm sending you my coordinates. I'll leave the back door open.
translation.fr: Je t'envoie mes coordonnées, je laisserai une porte ouverte.

translation.en: Shit.
I'm Nine of Hearts. I need your radio.
translation.fr: Je suis Neuf de Cœur. Votre radio !

translation.en: This is Nine of Hearts. Get out of there. It's a trap.
translation.fr: Ici Neuf de Cœur. Sortez de là, c'est un piège.

translation.en: Do you hear me? She found the tracker. Get out of there.
translation.fr: Elle a trouvé le traceur. Sortez de là.

translation.en: Do you hear me?
Yeah… I hear you.
What's going on?
- Where is she? -
- - What has she done?
- How long to fix it? - Oh.
I-- Could be minutes. Could be hours.
translation.fr: Ça peut prendre quelques minutes, ou des heures.

translation.en: You have until I get back.
The door won't move.
Damn it!
There must be an emergency override system.
translation.fr: Il doit y avoir un système d'urgence.

translation.en: We must have missed something.
translation.fr: Un truc nous a sûrement échappé.

translation.en: Jack, is there any way we can get hold of Stone?
No. No comms. We're still offline.
translation.fr: Non, on est toujours hors ligne.

translation.en: Maybe-- Maybe try the landline.
translation.fr: On peut essayer le réseau filaire.

translation.en: - Stone, thank God. Where are you? - Clubs are dead.
translation.fr: - Stone, où vous êtes ? - Les Trèfle sont morts.

translation.en: University was a trap.
I have new intel.
A new location.
We've-- We've lost Clubs?
What new intel?
Keya. She shut down the Heart.
- How do you know she's not playing you? - I don't.
translation.fr: - Qui vous dit qu'elle est fiable ? - Personne.

translation.en: We're gonna die in less than an hour.
translation.fr: On va mourir d'ici une heure.

translation.en: - They shut down our air supply. - What?
- She shut down our air supply. - Parker did.
translation.fr: - Elle a coupé l'aération. - C'est Parker.

translation.en: I believe her, Nomad.
I'd be dead too if I hadn't listened to her.
translation.fr: Je serais morte si je l'avais pas écoutée.

translation.en: I trust her, and you need to trust me.
translation.fr: Je la crois, et vous devez me croire.

translation.en: Fifty minutes.
I can work with that.
I'll see you.
You too.
Sorry, I need your truck.
translation.fr: Désolée, il me faut ce camion.

translation.en: I know you're in here, Keya.
translation.fr: Je sais que tu es là, Keya.

translation.en: You know, you still have a choice.
translation.fr: Tu sais, tu as encore le choix.

translation.en: You can still be a part of this.
translation.fr: Tu peux encore participer au projet.

translation.en: You're only delaying the inevitable.
translation.fr: Tu ne fais que retarder l'inévitable.

translation.en: - Would you like me to wait? - Definitely no.
translation.fr: - Vous voulez que j'attende ? - Sûrement pas.

translation.en: But thanks!
Come on, Keya.
Settle down now.
Conserve air.
- Move. -
Get the Heart back online.
Do it!
Get up.
Get up!
Right. Where do we start?
Fingers?
No, we'll be needing those. Knees?
translation.fr: Non, on en aura besoin. Les genoux ?

translation.en: Last chance.
Okay, I'll do it.
Go on.
I need to get back in there.
The Heart has to be disconnected and reconnected again to the servers.
translation.fr: Le Cœur doit être déconnecté et reconnecté aux serveurs.

translation.en: Any interference, the system automatically shuts down. You know that.
translation.fr: À la moindre interférence, le système se verrouille.

translation.en: Move.
This doesn't end well for you, Stone. Take another step, and she's dead.
translation.fr: Tu es mal barrée, Stone. Un pas de plus et elle est morte.

translation.en: - I don't care. I'm here for you. - Bullshit.
translation.fr: Je m'en fous, je suis là pour toi. Tu parles !

translation.en: You and I know that without this one,
translation.fr: On sait bien que sans elle,

translation.en: the Heart stays down and everyone inside that bunker dies,
translation.fr: le Cœur repartira pas, et ceux du bunker mourront.

translation.en: unless, of course, they're dead already.
translation.fr: À moins qu'ils soient déjà morts.

translation.en: I have the Heart, and I have the Kings. That's a winning hand.
translation.fr: J'ai le Cœur, j'ai les rois. Je vais gagner la partie.

translation.en: Okay. I'll put it down.
Good girl. Now, kick it away.
translation.fr: C'est bien. Pousse-la avec ton pied.

translation.en: Tell me this, though.
What's your point, hm?
And why do you have to kill them to make it?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu dois tuer tout le monde ?

translation.en: I've served my entire life, Rachel, and none of it mattered.
translation.fr: J'ai servi mon pays toute ma vie, Rachel. En vain.

translation.en: The world is still in chaos.
The Heart has the power to change everything.
translation.fr: Le Cœur a le pouvoir de tout changer.

translation.en: But the Charter are using it to keep things exactly as they are.
translation.fr: Mais la Charte s'en sert pour maintenir le statu quo.

translation.en: You don't wanna change anything. You just wanna be the one in charge.
translation.fr: Tu veux rien changer, tu veux juste être aux commandes.

translation.en: First thing you did with all that power was kill people.
translation.fr: Dès que tu as eu le pouvoir, tu as tué des gens.

translation.en: The problem with men like you, Parker,
translation.fr: Le problème, avec les gens comme toi,

translation.en: is that your power is only ever based on threats and violence.
translation.fr: c'est que votre pouvoir repose sur la menace et la violence.

translation.en: And when you brutalize everyone around you, even your own team…
translation.fr: Et quand tu brutalises les autres, même ta propre équipe,

translation.en: you'll never have the one thing I know I always will.
translation.fr: il te manque une chose que j'aurai toujours.

translation.en: Yeah?
And what is that, Rachel?
Someone to watch my back.
Maybe in the next life.
See you when I get there.
Nomad, tell me you're okay.
Is everyone still with us?
translation.fr: Tout le monde est en vie ?

translation.en: Yeah, yeah.
It's good to hear from you, Stone.
translation.fr: Je suis ravie de vous entendre.

translation.en: I knew I would.
Hey, Barry.
What's this?
I don't know.
It's beautiful.
But what is it? Who's it from?
Looking good.
I decided to embrace the cliché and use my time in jail to get ripped.
translation.fr: Un vrai cliché : j'ai profité de la prison pour me muscler.

translation.en: You've had worse goals.
So my lawyers tell me.
And you? Back with the Charter?
Yeah, I'm back with the Charter.
translation.fr: Oui, à nouveau avec la Charte.

translation.en: But on two conditions.
The Heart's an amazing tool.
translation.fr: Le Cœur est un outil génial.

translation.en: But that's all it is.
If we only follow the odds, we'll never do anything in spite of the odds.
translation.fr: Si on obéit aux statistiques, on ne les défie jamais.

translation.en: And what if the odds tell you to do nothing?
translation.fr: Et si les statistiques disent de rien faire ?
